markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Assassinate](/Feats.aspx?ID=1894) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 158 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=48)

**Prerequisites**
[Assassin Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1890)

**Requirements**
You have designated a mark using [Mark for Assassination](/Feats.aspx?ID=1890) and are completely [unnoticed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=41) by your mark.

</column>

---

You strike with one swift movement, trying to instantly slay your mark. Make a Strike against your mark. If you hit, your mark takes 6d6 extra precision damage with a basic Fortitude save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. If the mark critically fails, they die. This is an [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) effect. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to your Assassinate for 1 day.
name: Assassinate
requirement: You have designated a mark using  Mark for Assassination  and are completely  unnoticed  by your mark.
requirement_markdown: You have designated a mark using [Mark for Assassination](/Feats.aspx?ID=1890) and are completely [unnoticed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=41) by your mark.

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 12" pfs="Standard" > Assassinate Two Actions Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 158 2.0 Archetype Assassin Prerequisites Assassin Dedication Requirements You have designated a mark using Mark for Assassination and are completely unnoticed by your mark. --- You strike with one swift movement, trying to instantly slay your mark. Make a Strike against your mark. If you hit, your mark takes 6d6 extra precision damage with a basic Fortitude save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. If the mark critically fails, they die. This is an incapacitation effect. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to your Assassinate for 1 day.
